reqtypesstatusversion700
<div style="color:grey; text-align:right"> Reported by $trackerService.getTrackerUser($securityService.getCurrentUser()).name <br/> $date.long <div>

Requirements Test Case Coverage

Displays statistics about test coverage for selected requirements, i.e. the ratio of requirements linked and not linked by verification test cases. Requirements without linked verification test cases are also listed in detailed table below.

Requirements Test Case CoverageWorkItemsqlVelocity#if(!$pageParameters.version.values.empty) ,CF_WORKITEM CUSTOM_FIELD #endAND C_TYPE IN $pageParameters.reqtypes.toSql() #if(!$pageParameters.version.values.empty) AND CUSTOM_FIELD.FK_WORKITEM = WORKITEM.C_PK AND CUSTOM_FIELD.C_NAME = 'targetVersion' AND CUSTOM_FIELD.C_STRING_VALUE = '$pageParameters.version.singleValue().id()' #end #if(!$pageParameters.status.values.empty) AND C_STATUS IN $pageParameters.status.toSql() #end AND EXISTS (SELECT TEST.C_PK FROM WORKITEM TEST, STRUCT_WORKITEM_LINKEDWORKITEMS LINK WHERE LINK.FK_WORKITEM = WORKITEM.C_PK AND LINK.FK_P_WORKITEM = TEST.C_PK AND LINK.C_ROLE = '$pageParameters.verifiesLinkRole.toSql()')CoveredgreenWorkItemsqlVelocity#if(!$pageParameters.version.values.empty) ,CF_WORKITEM CUSTOM_FIELD #endAND C_TYPE IN $pageParameters.reqtypes.toSql() #if(!$pageParameters.version.values.empty) AND CUSTOM_FIELD.FK_WORKITEM = WORKITEM.C_PK AND CUSTOM_FIELD.C_NAME = 'targetVersion' AND CUSTOM_FIELD.C_STRING_VALUE = '$pageParameters.version.singleValue().id()' #end #if(!$pageParameters.status.values.empty) AND C_STATUS IN $pageParameters.status.toSql() #end AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT TEST.C_PK FROM WORKITEM TEST, STRUCT_WORKITEM_LINKEDWORKITEMS LINK WHERE LINK.FK_WORKITEM = WORKITEM.C_PK AND LINK.FK_P_WORKITEM = TEST.C_PK AND LINK.C_ROLE = '$pageParameters.verifiesLinkRole.toSql()')Uncoveredredtruefalse

<div style="text-align: left;"> There are <strong> <span class="polarion-rp-inline-widget" data-widget="com.polarion.countOfObjects"> <span class="polarion-rp-widget-parameters"> <sub id="dataSet"> <sub id="prototype">WorkItem</sub> <sub id="queryType">sqlVelocity</sub> <sub id="sqlTablesQuery">${esc.h}if(!${esc.d}pageParameters.version.values.empty) ,CF_WORKITEM CUSTOM_FIELD ${esc.h}end</sub> <sub id="sqlRestQuery">AND C_TYPE IN ${esc.d}pageParameters.reqtypes.toSql() ${esc.h}if(!${esc.d}pageParameters.version.values.empty) AND CUSTOM_FIELD.FK_WORKITEM = WORKITEM.C_PK AND CUSTOM_FIELD.C_NAME = 'targetVersion' AND CUSTOM_FIELD.C_STRING_VALUE = '${esc.d}pageParameters.version.singleValue().id()' ${esc.h}end ${esc.h}if(!${esc.d}pageParameters.status.values.empty) AND C_STATUS IN ${esc.d}pageParameters.status.toSql() ${esc.h}end AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT TEST.C_PK FROM WORKITEM TEST, STRUCT_WORKITEM_LINKEDWORKITEMS LINK WHERE LINK.FK_WORKITEM = WORKITEM.C_PK AND LINK.FK_P_WORKITEM = TEST.C_PK AND LINK.C_ROLE = '${esc.d}pageParameters.verifiesLinkRole.toSql()')</sub> </sub> <sub id="before"></sub><sub id="after">Requirements</sub> </span> </span> </strong> without verifying test cases. </div>

Requirements without Test Cases
